name: ai-knowledge-automation

scripts.test:auth: npm run allure:clean && playwright test tests/auth/
scripts.test:auth:headed: npm run allure:clean && playwright test tests/auth/ --headed
scripts.test:allure: npm run allure:clean && playwright test tests/auth/login.spec.ts --grep="should complete Gmail SSO login successfully"
scripts.test:allure:headed: npm run allure:clean && playwright test tests/auth/login.spec.ts --grep="should complete Gmail SSO login successfully" --headed
scripts.allure:serve: npm run allure:generate && allure serve allure-results
scripts.allure:fresh: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:allure && npm run allure:serve

description: E2E test automation for AI Knowledge Chat UI with Gmail SSO
